message: What has been your experience with http://www.alertpay.com/ ?

no - but if you're going to write alertpay integration, can I recommend you just write a payment module for momona (https://github.com/emesik/mamona) or similar. it will save you a lot of time. Another option to consider -- that I've used -- is braintree, which is still actively developed and has pretty good django integration https://github.com/danielgtaylor/braintree_django
